snippet.title: How we made MULTIPLAYER FPS game in ONE WEEK | Frontline Inferno
snippet.description:
Join us behind the scenes as we build Frontline Inferno from scratch in just one week! From concept to gameplay, this video dives into the fast-paced development process, challenges faced, and creative choices that shaped our arcade-style WWII arena shooter.

Come along, wishlist the game, and follow us for more behind-the-scenes madness!
🎮 Wishlist Frontline Inferno on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3177070/Frontline_Inferno/
📸 Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/heavymetallicsound_studios/
Check out Kostka Grafika on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/kostka_grafika/

0:00 Intro
0:22 Initial plans
1:54 What is Dead Fusion?
2:12 First weapons and animations
3:20 First testing
3:50 How social life waste our time to make games
5:31 Adding our Game to Steam
7:00 Fight with Steam documentation
8:08 Achievements
8:37 They accepted it
